languages.text: "Я видела один из документов Калькасара, когда прибыла для получения новых указаний. Мельком... но моя память — как пикт-рекордер: достаточно мгновения, чтобы написанное на бумаге запечатлелось в моем разуме. Я не знаю подробностей, но сам документ... стенограмма допроса. С финальной отметкой, означающей выведение кадра из свиты. А мы ведь знаем, как покидают свиту Лорд-инквизитора, дознаватель ван Калокс".

"I saw one of Calcazar's documents when I went to receive my new orders. Only a fleeting glimpse... but, with my memory like a pict-recorder, it was long enough for its contents to be imprinted on my mind. I do not know the details, but the document itself... was an interrogation transcript. With a final annotation indicating the removal of the person from the retinue. And we both know how someone leaves the Lord Inquisitor's retinue, Interrogator van Calox."
languages.original_text: "Я видела один из документов Калькасара, когда прибыла для получения новых указаний. languages.text: “当时，我去审判庭接受新的命令，偶然瞥到了卡尔卡扎桌子上的文件。虽然那只是匆匆一瞥……但我的记忆力就像视讯记录仪一样，哪怕只有一瞥，也足以将所有内容深深地印在我的脑海里。具体细节我并不清楚，但那份文件……是审讯记录。记录最后的注释部分，注明那个人已经从大审判官的随从中除名了。从大审判官的随从中除名代表什么意思，你我都很清楚，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官。”
languages.original_text: "I saw one of Calcazar's documents when I went to receive my new orders. Only a fleeting glimpse... but, with my memory like a pict-recorder, it was long enough for its contents to be imprinted on my mind. I do not know the details, but the document itself... was an interrogation transcript. With a final annotation indicating the removal of the person from the retinue. And we both know how someone leaves the Lord Inquisitor's retinue, Interrogator van Calox."

traits.locale_text: “当时，我去审判庭接受新的命令，偶然瞥到了卡尔卡扎桌子上的文件。虽然那只是匆匆一瞥……但我的记忆力就像视讯记录仪一样，哪怕只有一瞥，也足以将所有内容深深地印在我的脑海里。具体细节我并不清楚，但那份文件……是审讯记录。记录最后的注释部分，注明那个人已经从审判长的随从中除名了。从审判长的随从中除名代表什么意思，你我都很清楚，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «Vi uno de los documentos de Calcazar cuando fui a recibir mis nuevas órdenes. Solo por un instante... pero, debido a que mi memoria es como un grabaimágenes, con eso bastó para registrar su contenido en mi mente. Desconozco los detalles, pero el documento en sí... era la transcripción de una interrogación. Con una nota final que indicaba la eliminación de la víctima de su séquito. Y los dos sabemos cómo se abandona el séquito del Lord Inquisidor, interrogador van Calox».
languages.original_text: "I saw one of Calcazar's documents when I went to receive my new orders. Only a fleeting glimpse... but, with my memory like a pict-recorder, it was long enough for its contents to be imprinted on my mind. I do not know the details, but the document itself... was an interrogation transcript. With a final annotation indicating the removal of the person from the retinue. And we both know how someone leaves the Lord Inquisitor's retinue, Interrogator van Calox."

Y los dos sabemos cómo se abandona el séquito del Lord Inquisidor, interrogador van Calox».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「新たな命令を受け取りに行ったときに、カルカサルの文書の一つを見ました。ほんの一瞬垣間見ただけですが…ピクト・レコーダーのような私の記憶には、その内容が心に刻み込まれるのに十分な長さでした。私はそう思っています。詳細は分かりませんが、文書自体は…尋問記録でした。その人物を従者の職から外すことを示す最終的な注釈が付いていました。そして、私たちは二人とも、その人がどのようにしてロード・インクィジターの従者、インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックスから離れるのかを知っています」
languages.original_text: "I saw one of Calcazar's documents when I went to receive my new orders. Only a fleeting glimpse... but, with my memory like a pict-recorder, it was long enough for its contents to be imprinted on my mind. I do not know the details, but the document itself... was an interrogation transcript. With a final annotation indicating the removal of the person from the retinue. And we both know how someone leaves the Lord Inquisitor's retinue, Interrogator van Calox."

traits.locale_text: 「新たな命令を受け取りに行ったときに、カルカサルの文書の一つを見ました。ほんの一瞬垣間見ただけですが…ピクト・レコーダーのような私の記憶には、その内容が心に刻み込まれるのに十分な長さでした。私はそう思っています。詳細は分かりませんが、文書自体は…尋問記録でした。その人物を従者の職から外すことを示す最終的な注釈が付いていました。そして、私たちは二人とも、その人がどのようにしてロード・インクィジターの従者、インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックスから離れるのかを知っています」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: « J'ai pu voir l'un des documents de Calcazar lorsque j'ai reçu mes nouveaux ordres. Je n'en ai qu'un bref aperçu... mais grâce à ma mémoire visuelle supérieure, cela m'a suffi à imprimer son contenu dans mon esprit. Je ne connais pas les détails, mais le document en lui-même... était la retranscription d'un interrogatoire, avec une annotation finale demandant que l'individu en question soit retiré de l'entourage. Et nous savons tous deux qu'il n'y a qu'une seule manière de quitter l'entourage du seigneur inquisiteur, interrogateur van Calox. »
languages.original_text: "I saw one of Calcazar's documents when I went to receive my new orders. Only a fleeting glimpse... but, with my memory like a pict-recorder, it was long enough for its contents to be imprinted on my mind. I do not know the details, but the document itself... was an interrogation transcript. With a final annotation indicating the removal of the person from the retinue. And we both know how someone leaves the Lord Inquisitor's retinue, Interrogator van Calox."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai pu voir l'un des documents de Calcazar lorsque j'ai reçu mes nouveaux ordres. Je n'en ai qu'un bref aperçu... mais grâce à ma mémoire visuelle supérieure, cela m'a suffi à imprimer son contenu dans mon esprit. Je ne connais pas les détails, mais le document en lui-même... était la retranscription d'un interrogatoire, avec une annotation finale demandant que l'individu en question soit retiré de l'entourage. Et nous savons tous deux qu'il n'y a qu'une seule manière de quitter l'entourage du seigneur inquisiteur, interrogateur van Calox. »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Ich habe eines von Calcazars Dokumenten gesehen, als ich meine neuen Befehle erhalten sollte. Es war nur ein kurzer Blick ... aber da mein Gedächtnis funktioniert wie ein Vid-Rekorder, hat sich der Inhalt in meinem Geist eingeprägt. Einzelheiten kenne ich nicht, aber das Dokument selbst ... war ein Verhörprotokoll. Die letzte Anmerkung ordnete die Entfernung der Person aus dem Gefolge an. Und wir wissen beide, wie man das Gefolge des Großinquisitors verlässt, Interrogator van Calox."
languages.original_text: "I saw one of Calcazar's documents when I went to receive my new orders. languages.text: "Yeni emirlerimi almaya gittiğimde Calcazar'ın dokümanlarından birini gördüm. Yalnızca bir anlığına gözümle temas etsem de foto kaydediciden farksız hafızamın, içeriklerini zihnime yazmasına yetti. Detayları bilmiyorum ancak dokümanın kendisi bir sorgu nüshasıydı. En son açıklamada, şahsın maiyetten çıkarılmasından söz ediliyordu. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun maiyetinden ayrılan kişilere ne olduğunu ikimiz de biliyoruz Sorgucu von Calox."
languages.original_text: "I saw one of Calcazar's documents when I went to receive my new orders. Only a fleeting glimpse... but, with my memory like a pict-recorder, it was long enough for its contents to be imprinted on my mind. I do not know the details, but the document itself... was an interrogation transcript. With a final annotation indicating the removal of the person from the retinue. And we both know how someone leaves the Lord Inquisitor's retinue, Interrogator van Calox."

traits.locale_text: "Yeni emirlerimi almaya gittiğimde Calcazar'ın dokümanlarından birini gördüm. Yalnızca bir anlığına gördüm ama hafızam foto kaydedici gibidir, içeriklerini zihnime yazmama yetti. Detayları bilmiyorum ancak dokümanın kendisi bir sorgu nüshasıydı. En son açıklamada, şahsın maiyetten çıkarılmasından söz ediliyordu. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun maiyetinden ayrılan kişilere ne olduğunu ikimiz de biliyoruz Sorgucu von Calox."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
